creator: linamaes
sql: SELECT PRINTF('%04d-%02d', "year", "month") AS yearMonth, GBIF_EEARGCode(1000, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 10000)) AS eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM occurrence WHERE occurrenceStatus = 'PRESENT' AND continent = 'EUROPE' AND speciesKey IN (2978552, 2489005, 3190653, 2498252, 3084923, 2340977, 2706080, 2502792, 3170247, 2440934, 3129663, 2882443, 2437394, 2437399, 3189935, 5828232, 4284921, 2704521, 2482499, 2702865, 5329212, 2225776, 8909595, 8979506, 8971201, 5712056, 2350580, 2350570, 2984306, 6063677, 7287606, 3034825, 3628745, 3642949, 2984537, 7978544, 2891770, 8848208, 2865565, 9799308, 2394486, 8114276, 5855350, 2427091, 5421039, 5420991, 2650436, 2869311, 5289808, 2394604, 2440946, 4264680, 5361785, 5361762, 2433536, 5358460, 2434552, 5219858, 2498305, 2226990, 3086784, 2390064, 4033648, 2870583, 7965247, 2765942, 2227300, 9442269, 5218786, 2362868, 2977647, 2486131, 5824863, 5274863, 5219681, 5219683, 5035187, 5035230, 5035017, 2437450, 2480764, 2443002, 3054399, 6164088, 6247411, 1315391, 5217334) AND hasCoordinate = TRUE AND (coordinateUncertaintyInMeters <= 10000 OR coordinateUncertaintyInMeters IS NULL) AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'ZERO_COORDINATE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_INVALID') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COUNTRY_COORDINATE_MISMATCH') AND "month" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY yearMonth, eeaCellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class ORDER BY yearMonth DESC, eeaCellCode ASC, countryCode ASC
